name: Zepher's Galaxy
description:
Zepher's Galaxy Info

Zepher's Galaxy is a top down game with SpaceShips

The Objective of the game is to reach the Warp Gate at the End of the Map

Destroy Planets to get Artifacts (Cargo controls how many you can hold at once)

Drop Artifacts of at Space Staion to give you Credits

Space Stations restore your HP

Your Shields Regenerate over Time

Credits are Basically your Points/Score for the game

Use your Laser's to kill Enemy WarShips and Bases

Asteriods / Moons will damage you ,they will stop moving once you kill its Planet

Comment what your score was if you want! (Add the Carrier's Credits with the MotherShips Credits to get your total Credits)

The Carrier 

- Left Screen

- W, A, S, D Movement

The MotheShip

- Right Screen

- Arrow Keys  Movement

Extra

I created this game in Unity and all the Digital Art and Coding was done by me
